# Build results
bin/
obj/
out/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.sdf
*.cache
*.dbmdl
*.pidb
*.svclog

# Visual Studio Code settings
.vscode/

# Rider project files
.idea/

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
*.log

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
*.nuspec

# Visual Studio folder
.vs/

# Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.DotSettings.user

# ASP.NET temp files
aspnet-client/
ClientBin/
Generated_Code/

# Others
*.bak
*.orig

# Publish profiles
Properties/PublishProfiles/

# Backup & temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.old
*.swp

# Test Results
TestResults/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Local database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Rider + JetBrains files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Entity Framework Migrations history
Migrations/

# dotenv (if using)
.env
